svg.text: Join Match Use Case
Use Case Specification
Use Case Name:
Join Match
Actor(s):
Regular User
Description:
Allows users to participate in available sports matches, earning XP rewards
and receiving notifications while updating match participant counts and status.
Preconditions:
1. User must be logged in with complete profile
2. Match must be available with open spots and not yet started
Main Flow:
1. User discovers match through Find Games page or recommendations
2. User clicks "View Details" to see complete match information
3. System displays match details including host, participants, and requirements
4. User reviews match compatibility and skill level requirements
5. User clicks "Join Match" button
6. System validates user eligibility and available spots
7. System adds user to participant list and updates match count
8. System awards XP points for match participation
9. System sends join confirmation notification to user
10. System notifies host of new participant
11. Match status updates to show current participant count
Alternative Flows:
A1. Match full: System displays "Match is full" message with waitlist option
A2. Already joined: System shows "Already joined" status with leave option
A3. Skill mismatch: System warns about skill level differences
A4. Schedule conflict: System alerts user about potential time conflicts
A5. Leave match: User can leave joined match with penalty considerations
